titles: The divine dreamer: or, a short treatise discovering the true effect and power of dreames; confirmed by the most learned and best approved authors. Whereunto is annexed the dreame of a young gentleman, immediatly before the death of the late earle of Strafford.
author: Gonzalo.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, --  Earl of, 1593-1641 --  Early works to 1800.
